entry.title: Musical Improv Weekend
entry.content:
Baby Wants Candy (BWC) is thrilled to lead a two day music improv intensive in Switzerland. No musical improv experience needed.

Based on BWC’s signature form- a one hour, completely improvised musical with a full band, participants will learn how to:

  • Create musical narratives while still maintaining the...

entry.title: Double feature
entry.content: In this very special double feature, we present two unique improv shows in one fantastic night. First, Don’t Touch My Mushroom Improv will play their new improvised format “The Gathering” for the first time ever. It’s a show about a dramatic, life changing event, gathering friends and enemies, envious...

entry.title: The Show
entry.content:
A whole musical being improvised in front of your eyes!

Have you ever heard of Hamilton? What about Cats? Maybe Grease? Well, this is nothing like that. We are going to develop a whole story from your suggestions. It will be full of emotions and epic songs.

We are...
